summary: The Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine is one of the Nobel Prizes which were created by Alfred Nobel.
full_text: Sir Peter Mansfield FRS, , is an English physicist who was awarded the 2003 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine, shared with Paul Lauterbur, for discoveries concerning Magnetic Resonance Imaging . Mansfield is a professor at the University of Nottingham.
title: Peter Mansfield
